H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H7101.def: = a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H1497.def: = action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force

H5785.def: = the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal

H7607.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H6106.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H7607.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H6584.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which a locust sheds its skin

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5785.def: = the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal

H6106.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H6566.def: = causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H7037.def: = a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H2199.def: = action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H5641.def: = state in which people or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H4611.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5391.def: = action by which a person or animal uses teeth to cut into something, like another person or animal

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H2377.def: = series of pictures or events in mind of sleeping person; ≈ associated with things that disappear in a moment

H2821.def: = process by which the light gradually disappears, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars can no longer reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, death, and lack of enlightenment

H7080.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6937.def: = process by which an object becomes dark in color

H2374.def: = someone who receives divine messages, primarily by means of visions

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H7080.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H2659.def: = action by which animals strike the ground with their feet

H5844.def: = causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else

H8222.def: = body hair growing above the upper lip

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4617.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H595.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H199.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is in contrast with what has preceded

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H1369.def: = the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H6588.def: = action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6140.def: literally: to be crooked of ways; hence: = state in which humans are morally and/or ethically unacceptable as far as their behavior is concerned

H3477.def: = state in which objects are without a bend or curve

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H7810.def: = an object, usually of some value, given to a person; ► can be given without any expectation of exchange or often with the purpose to influence or persuade another person

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H4242.def: = the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H7080.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H8172.def: = state in which humans rest part of their body, such as their back or their arms, on an object that provides support, such as a tree or stick

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1558.def: = waste matter remaining after food has been digested, discharged from the bowels of humans and animals

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H2790.def: = causative action by which someone makes incised marks on a surface of wood or stone with the help of a sharp and hard tool

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5856.def: = heap of stones ◄ remaining after the total destruction of a town; ≈ associated with hardship and poverty

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3293.def: = a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
